name: Don't Crash (itch) (DyDevStudios)
description:
[BAHASA VERSION]

Menghindari serangan asteroid dan kembali ke Bumi dengan selamat

*

Don't Crash merupakan permainan android yang cara bermainnya, yakni dengan mengetukkan jari ke layar ponsel pintar untuk membuat player bergerak.

**

Dikembangkan oleh DyDev Studios

[ENGLISH VERSION]

Dodge the asteroid strikes and return to Earth safely

*

Don't Crash is an android game that is played by tapping your finger on the smartphone screen to make the player move.

**

Developed by DyDev Studios
